|type=wireless router, media bridge, smart switch |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=CE4150 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=2 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=NAND |fla1_num=2 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=DDR3 |ram1_num=8 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT5372 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1111 |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.0 Chip;CSR (Qualcomm);CSR8510;;1;,,, 7-Port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2517-JZX;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Flash Controller;Phison Electronics;PS2251;;1;,,, 24-Bit,192-kHz Stereo DAC;Burr-Brown Products;PCM1755;;1;,,, 16-Bit I2C and SMBus Expander;TI;TCA9539;;1;,,, 64K 16-Bit MCU;Microchip;PIC24FJ64GA;;1;,,, Single Channel USB Power Switch;TI;TPS2065;;3;,,, Single-Chip HDMI Transmitter Port Protection;TI;TPD12S521;;1;,,, 1.5A Ultra LDO Linear Regulator;TI;TPS74201;;1;,,, 800mA Low Dropout Positive Regulator;Burr-Brown Products;;2;,,, 35V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDD6637;;1;,,, Dual 30V N-Channel SyncFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDS6982S;;1;,,, Dual Synchronous Step-Down Controller;TI;TPS51124;;1;,,, System Clock w/Selectable DDR Frequency;IDT;6V49185PAG;;1;,,, PC Main Clock;IDT;9LPRS525AGLF;;1;,,, Low-Power, Low-Offset Voltage,Dual Comparator;TI;LM393;;2;,,, 256K Two-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C256;;1;,,, |flags=Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI, Audio in/out, |stock_os=Linux;2.6.28 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=cisco |oui=1C:AA:07 |oui_eth=1C:AA:07 }} {{TagLine|Cisco Edge 300 Series Switch witch WiFi and Bluetooth}} :[https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/switches/edge-300-series/data_sheet_c78-694183.html Datasheet]
*OEM: [[Foxconn]] U58O201 (U58O201T04)
:1x Gigabit Ethernet uplink, 4x Fast-Ethernet switch speeds :The entry also appears to apply to the HS-E300-AP-K9..
===See also=== *[[Cisco Edge 340 DMP (CS-E340W)]] (-M32-A-K9) - ''Digital Media Player'' • [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collateral/video/edge-340-digital-media-player/datasheet-c78-732178.html DS] :● CPU: @1.60GHz (Dual-core) :● Memory: 2GB (DDR3 memory) :● Storage: 32GB (built-in SSD), one SD slot :(multi-level cell [MLC] SD card highly preferred)
